file_content.text: Isn't this the place?
The password, genius. She's not going to open it while the Voidwolf is hunting her.
Uh, didn't the Jedi lady say something about a password?
Password.
We could be assassins. Give her password.
Uh, Kava... java... hmm. Kavi... davi... doo. Am I getting close?
Hrph... password... hrph....
It started with a "k," right...?
Oh, yeah, that.
You're hopeless. Kavaa kyotopa bu whirlee backa.
I doubt the Voidwolf's men would be so forgetful.
Kavaa kyotopa bu whirlee backa.
I remember it.
Smeeleya whao tupee upee.
Do you want to be rescued or not?
Just let me in.
Shh. Keep it down.
I'm passing you the key. Check every corner before you use it. The Voidwolf has Sith assassins; they could be anywhere.
Risha? I thought that sounded like you! Did you finally decide to join us on the straight and narrow?
Hardly. But I figured it's just like you to go to ground in the enemy's treasury.
I figured it was the last place his bloodhounds would go sniffing.
Close the door. I figured this was the last place the Voidwolf's bloodhounds would go digging, but it won't be long.
The Imperials are thick out there. We should go quickly.
Let's get out of here.
It's not that easy. He's got his fingers in the Republic now.
Master Sumalee called this the Voidwolf's private vault...?
What is this place?
Mostly cleaned out, but I was hoping I could learn something about his plans. And yes, help yourself.
What's going on?
The Voidwolf's been recruiting. He's courting Hutts, the White Maw, hit men for hire. Anyone who won't pledge loyalty goes to hard vacuum.
And he's got enough spies in our space station that my cover was blown the minute I landed.
What do you think? Is there a way you can smuggle me up without any of his people... or our people... catching wise?
As it happens, smuggling's my specialty.
Funny you should ask.
Ah, now I see where Risha found you.
You wouldn't even imagine....
Good. Because there's as many loyal guards up there as spies. I need to get past them, not through them, if you know what I mean.
Any idea how?
I signed on for fighting Imperials. You want me to defend you against the Republic, too, that's gonna cost.
That'll be extra.
I was going to hide in there--it's an automated cargo shuttle full of everything here the Voidwolf thought worth keeping.
Go to the space station and get security to let us through, and you're welcome to keep everything in it.
I trust you can come up with a story to explain why you're shipping Imperial droids off Hoth?
